features: PLUMP IT UP: the nutrient-rich, plump-it-up power of this haircare infused with ProVitamin B7 biotin and collagen helps give each strand of hair a beautiful boost, this dynamic duo will leave your hair feeling thicker, fuller, and looking oh, so healthy

FULL AND SHINY: after just one use, strands feel thicker and look fuller; this shampoo helps to thicken and texturize any hair type; immerse your skinny strands in this super volumizing formula to create fuller looking, shiny hair; beauty, pure and simple

HOW TO USE: apply shampoo generously to wet hair, massage into a lather through to ends, then rinse the hair thoroughly; after shampooing, follow with a volumizing conditioner to keep your locks looking thick, full, shiny, smooth, and healthier than ever

BEAUTY, PURE AND SIMPLE: induge your hair the way nature intended with OGX's commitment to sustainable ingredients; we'll never ask what you want to fix about your hair, we just want to know what you love about it, so that we can make you love it even more

ROCK WHAT YOU GOT: the hair you have makes you, you; be proud of those unique locks; here at OGX, unattainable looks don't inspire us but originality does, that's why we love being different; we approach beauty in our own way, and we hope that you will too
body.description: Exclusive Blend With Vitamin B7 Biotin, Collagen And Wheat Protein, Infuses Nutrients Into Every Strand, For Thicker, Fuller Hair.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: we approach beauty in our own way, pure and simple. Originality inspires us, that’s why we love being different; from our exotic ingredients, to the shape of our bottles, to our quest for sustainability — we approach beauty in our own way. Biotin & Collagen Conditioner 25.4oz The nutrient-rich, plump-it-up power of this haircare infused with Vitamin B7 biotin + collagen helps give each strand a beautiful boost. This dynamic duo will leave your hair feeling thicker, fuller and looking oh, so healthy. Nutrient rich volumizing conditioner Helps create the appearance of thicker hair Leaves hair looking full & voluptuous With Biotin, Collagen and Wheat Proteins Sulfate free surfactant hair care system

Benefits, Ingredients, Hair Type, Regimen Benefits Help thicken and texturize any hair type, this high-performance infusion with biotin and collagen will help give your hair a beautiful boost after just one use. Ingredients An exclusive blend with Vitamin B7 biotin, collagen, and hydrolyzed wheat protein, helps to infuse nutrients into every strand and creates the appearance of thicker, fuller, healthier looking hair. Hair Type This product is good for everyday use, works well with most hair types. *Oily *Damaged *Color-Treated *Frizzing *Straight Regimen For best results, use our entire Biotin & Collagen collection to help infuse nutrients into every strand. After applying conditioner, we recommend using our treatment to help moisturize and plumpen strands without weighing them down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Shampoo! Go for it!
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried a shampoo that I highly recommend for its great scent and ability to make hair soft and full. The fragrance is a refreshing blend of floral and fruity notes that lingers in the hair. After using it, my hair felt silky smooth, voluminous, and healthy. It's gentle on hair and contains natural ingredients. I believe it's an excellent choice for daily use. Give it a try and enjoy the great results!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is our favorite shampoo! Also love the conditioner. Keeps our hair soft and smelling good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo has thickened my hair and makes it look much nicer!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product because I was very sick last year and lost a lot of hair. I literally started balding. This product has helped my hair and has given me some volume! It's great quality and it smells nice! It is moisturizing, as I have very dry hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product, it works
reviews.reviewText: My hair is very thin and this product does give it some volume.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice Product - it seems to have really helped my thin hair
reviews.reviewText: I don't 100% know if this shampoo is what is contributing to my hair having some volume but since using it I really like the results and will not be changing it! Certainly a reasonable price point!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product smells amazing and the soft feeling it gives to the hair is very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lovely scent but needs to be CRUELTY FREE
reviews.reviewText: This is one of my favorite things I have ever smelled. And it seems to wash well, although less sudsy than some. My issue is that I cannot believe they still make stuff that is not cruelty free. Please stop testing on defenseless little animals and be ecologically responsible.
Le gustó mucho el producto a mi esposa, ella ya no había ocupado con anterioridad y sabía que lo que estábamos pidiendo es de calidad ha notado gran mejoría en su cabello desde la primera vez
